input.sentences: the triathlon had runners and cyclists and rowers .
[male] had participated for the last 5 years .
a group of women started the race with a parade .
the boats were ready for the participants .
once the runners made it to the boats this river would be packed .
output.sentences: He was very excited for the race to start.
There was a marching band to get things kicked off for the race,
The winner got to pick which boat they would like as a prize.
Jim wanted to win so he could ride the boat in the river near his house.
